name: Fallen Angel (itch) (Gecco Lab)
description:
Fallen Angel is an endless falling game featuring a raunchy Angel on her quest to collect magical orbs as you can either violently kick the living hell out of the pigeons or die crashing into them. The game is a submission to the 2022 Mini Jam on the theme of 'Birds' with the limitation apart from the 72-hour challenge, is the "Can't Stop Moving" concept that we must incorporate into the project. With the tremendous lack of talent in our coding skills, we approached the project with an aim to create a polished, gory, and vulgar entertaining endless game without any originality to the game mechanic whatsoever! Nonetheless, as newcomers to the game dev community, we aim to simply create an entertaining game for the community.

Enjoy!
